trans-unit.source: Archangel's Light

trans-unit.source: You gain 2 life for each card in your graveyard, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

trans-unit.target: 「这是艾维欣的光芒。即使她不在此处，也替我们带来希望。」～艾维欣僧侣拉多夫

trans-unit.source: "It will take more than steel alone to purge this world of evil."

trans-unit.source: Target permanent you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, instead you and each permanent you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Even the House of Galan, who takes the most scholarly approach to the mystic traditions, has resorted to exploring more primitive methods in Avacyn's absence.
